pr_title: Fix MP Config FAT tests so they can run against mpConfig 2.0

timeline.bodyText: you got some tabs here maybe
timeline.author: Emily-Jiang
Emily-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: Please list what these tests for.
timeline.author: Emily-Jiang

replies.bodyText:
Any tests within LibertySpecificConfigTests.java classes are tests for functionality specific to Liberty's implementation (mpConfig < 2.0) of MP Config (as explained in the comment).
The tests should be self-explanatory, or have comments explaining their purpose.
replies.author: Joseph-Cass

timeline.bodyText: why did you change the year?
timeline.author: Emily-Jiang
Emily-Jiang

timeline.message:
Fix MP Config FAT tests so that appropriate existing tests can run against mpConfig 2.0

* Created mpConfig2.0 specific tests within the 2.0 FAT bucket where the functionality has changed from 1.X-> 2.0
* Created mpConfig1.x specific tests/packages within the 1.x FAT buckets, where the Liberty impl has extra or different functionality from SmallRye impl

timeline.author: Azquelt

timeline.bodyText: These methods which return null look like they're not referenced anywhere any more?
timeline.author: Azquelt

timeline.bodyText: Not sure that this interface is actually referenced anywhere apart from the bean that implements it. Maybe it could be taken out?
timeline.author: Azquelt

replies.bodyText: Yes, you're right, only ConfigFieldInjectionBean.java implements this interface. I'd be happy to take it out. This would also resolve this comment: #14375 (comment)
replies.author: Joseph-Cass

timeline.message: Tidy code and update copyright headers
Tidy code and update copyright headers
Tidy code and update copyright headers

timeline.bodyText:
This test isn't correct any more if any of the system properties or environment variables contain ${foo} as this would trigger property expansion so the input value won't match the value retrieved from config.
This does seem to happen on some linux systems.
timeline.author: Azquelt

timeline.message:
Fix MP Config FAT tests so that appropriate existing tests can run against mpConfig 2.0

* Created mpConfig2.0 specific tests within the 2.0 FAT bucket where the functionality has changed from 1.X-> 2.0
* Created mpConfig1.x specific tests/packages within the 1.x FAT buckets, where the Liberty impl has extra or different functionality from SmallRye impl
